card.name: CW - Back to the queue reset

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer  @jakovanrensburg 

This can be archived.

I have monitored the change i made and all works well.
The issue still occurs from Tebogo's PC which Anthony/Gordon was investigating but the Database change prevents the double call from messing up the data for a recapture.

i will keep the change in place as it serves as validation.
